quote: Science can flourish only in an atmosphere of free speech.  – Albert Einstein
fact: The name Wendy was made up for the book Peter Pan. There was never a recorded Wendy before it.
joke:
What is the difference between ignorance and apathy?

I don't know and I don't care.
